data.name: Project Lazarus
data.detailed_description:
Project Lazarus is a reverse bullet hell, mech survival game with rogue-lite elements! Snowball your mech's arsenal to outlast the wave of alien monsters. Pick up items and crystals to level up, install and upgrade your mech and establish fire superiority. Every mech has its own control scheme and weapon installation slots, so make the right choice for the environment and your style of gameplay. Then, deploy your mech to the ground of an alien planet and survive the drop!

We envision 3 main features for Project Lazarus to be ready for full release.
1) Base game mode (Survival), which is complete.
2) A variety of unique mechs and weapons.
3) An alternative game mode that we plan to add in the future.

At the time of Early Access release, Project Lazarus features
6 Mechs with unique control scheme
15 Weapons
3 Stages

data.short_description: You are the first party mech pilot of alien planet colonizers! Project Lazarus is a survival game with rogue-lite elements. Deploy and upgrade your mech to the metal!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change as development furthers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change as development furthers

content_descriptors.notes: Minor blood splatters when stepping on alien monsters!
